statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); printf "\033[1;34m%s\033[0m" "$(basename "$(dirname "$cwd")")/$(basename "$cwd")"; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$branch" ]]; then printf "\033[37m[\033[34m%s\033[37m]\033[0m " "$branch"; fi; fi; if [[ -n "$AWS_PROFILE" ]]; then printf "<aws:%s>" "$AWS_PROFILE"; [[ -n "$AWS_REGION" ]] && printf " <region:%s>" "$AWS_REGION"; fi; printf "\n\033[1;32mâžœ\033[0m "
